docs.snippet: The American soccer football champions, Bethlehem Steel Football Club, reinforced by some recent additions, including stars of Paterson Football Club, the Robins Dry Dock eleven of Brooklyn, and Merchants' Shipbuilding F.C. of Harriman, Penn., will...
docs.lead_paragraph: The American soccer football champions, Bethlehem Steel Football Club, reinforced by some recent additions, including stars of Paterson Football Club, the Robins Dry Dock eleven of Brooklyn, and Merchants' Shipbuilding F.C. of Harriman, Penn., will sail Wednesday afternoon for a series of a dozen games in Seandlnavia following which the team may go direct to Brazil for a six-game series.

headline.main: TEAM WILL VISIT BRAZIL; Bethlehem, Steel Soccer Eleven to Play Six Games in South America.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 26.--The United States Shipping Board now has 829 ships of 4,248,973 deadweight tons engaged in the general commerce of the seas, exclusive of more than 2,500,000 tons still in war service for the Army and Navy, and in overseas civilian food relief work. headline.main: PALMER ANNOUNCES SUITS; "Prompt Action" Against Big Five Under AntiTrust Laws.ASSERTS EVIDENCE IS CLEARLaws Broad Enough, He Says,to Cover Civil or Criminal Action.KRESEL TO CONDUCT CASESTrade Commission Tells Wilson That There Is "ConclusiveEvidence" of Conspiracies. Promises "Prompt Action." Trusts Kresel as Prosecutor. PALMER ANNOUNCES SUITS Volumes of Evidence Ready. Assert Proof Is Conclusive. Competitors at Their Mercy. Summary of the Findings. Charge Joint Ownership. Statements Called Deceptive. SStock Held in Families. Methods of Competition.

docs.snippet: The inauguration of the first Polish Consulate in America took place last  evening at a dinner given by Constantine Buszezynski, Consul General of Poland, to the representatives of the consulates of other nations in the Gotham Hotel.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 17.--The women of the nation are planning to take a prominent part in the discussion and settlement of labor problems. The National Women's Trade Union of America has called a world congress of working women in Washington for Oct....
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 17.--The women of the nation are planning to take a prominent part in the discussion and settlement of labor problems. The National Women's Trade Union of America has called a world congress of working women in Washington for Oct. 23.
